articles.author: Mary Shinn mary.shinn@gazette.com
articles.title: After suffering COVID-19 vaccine-caused blood clots, Colorado Springs woman sees problems with federal compensation system - Colorado Springs Gazette
articles.description: Kendra Lippy, a healthy 38-year-old, nearly died this spring after severe blood clots thought to be caused by the Johnson and Johnson vaccine sent most of her organs into failure.
articles.content: Kendra Lippy, a healthy 38-year-old, nearly died this spring after severe blood clots thought to be caused by the Johnson and Johnson vaccine sent most of her organs into failure. Now facing a life w… [+7645 chars]
